description:
Professional-grade stock market analysis and predictions powered by AI, accessible directly through Claude Desktop.

**Key Features:**
• 10-day price predictions - 79.86% directional accuracy (validated on 12,901 predictions)
• Market regime detection - Bull/bear/sideways classification
• AI-powered stock discovery - Find undervalued opportunities
• Portfolio optimization - RL-based rebalancing
• Batch predictions - Analyze 50 stocks at once

**What You Get:**
- Confidence scores for every prediction
- Expected price ranges (high/low targets)
- Risk assessments (volatility, correlation)
- Statistical validation (Sharpe Ratio 2.34, p < 0.000001)
- Full transparency: investbuddy.ai/transparency

**5 MCP Tools:**
1. get_stock_prediction - 10-day forecasts
2. get_market_regime - Market condition detection
3. discover_stocks - AI screening
4. analyze_portfolio - Portfolio optimization
5. batch_predict - Multiple tickers at once

**Pricing:**
• Free: 5 MCP calls/day
• Pro: $19/mo Holiday Beta (normally $39/mo)
• 7-day free trial, no credit card required

**Tech:**
v20251130_correlation ensemble (LSTM + RL + Transformers) validated on 30 S&P 100 stocks over 2 years (2023-2025).

**Perfect for:**
Day traders, financial analysts, long-term investors, and anyone wanting data-driven stock insights without leaving Claude.

**Setup:** 60 seconds via npx. Full documentation at investbuddy.ai/mcp
